class Solution {
public:
    vector<string> generateParenthesis(int n) {
        vector<string> result;
        if (n == 0){
            result.push_back("");
            return result;
        }
        helper("", result, n, n);
        return result;
    }
    void helper(string item, vector<string>& result, int left, int right){
        if(0 == right && left == 0){
            result.push_back(item);
            return;
        }
        if(left > 0){
            helper(item+'(', result, left-1, right);
        }
        if(left < right){
            helper(item+')', result, left, right-1);
        }
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    int sumOfLeftLeaves(TreeNode* root) {
        if (!root){
            return 0;
        }
        queue<TreeNode*> Q;
        Q.push(root);
        int s = 0;
        while(!Q.empty()){
            TreeNode* node = Q.front();
            TreeNode* temp;
            Q.pop();
            if(node->left){
                temp = node->left;
                if((temp->left == NULL) && (temp->right == NULL)){
                    s += temp->val;
                }
                Q.push(temp);
            }
            if(node->right){
                Q.push(node->right);
            }
        }
        return s;
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    int maxDepth(TreeNode* root) {
        if(!root){
            return 0;
        }
        int len = 0;
        queue<TreeNode*> Q;
        Q.push(root);
        while(!Q.empty()){
            int n = Q.size();
            for(int i=0; i<n; i++){
                TreeNode* node = Q.front();
                Q.pop();
                if(node->left){
                    Q.push(node->left);
                }
                if(node->right){
                    Q.push(node->right);
                }
            }
            len++;
        }
        return len;
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };

class Solution {
public:
    TreeNode* mirrorTree(TreeNode* root) {
        if(!root){
            return NULL;
        }
        helper(root);
        return root;
    }
    void helper(TreeNode* root){
        if(!root){
            return;
        }
        TreeNode* node = root->left;
        root->left = root->right;
        root->right = node;
        helper(root->left);
        helper(root->right);
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    TreeNode* mergeTrees(TreeNode* t1, TreeNode* t2) {
        if(!t1 && !t2){
            return NULL;
        }
        queue<TreeNode*> Q1;
        Q1.push(t1);
        queue<TreeNode*> Q2;
        Q2.push(t2);
        if(t1 && t2){
            t1->val = t2->val + t1->val;
        }
        else if(t2){
            return t2;
        }
        else if(t1){
            return t1;
        }
        while(!Q1.empty() && !Q2.empty()){
            TreeNode* node1 = Q1.front();
            TreeNode* node2 = Q2.front();
            Q1.pop();
            Q2.pop();
            if(node1->left && node2->left){
                node1->left->val = node1->left->val + node2->left->val;
                Q1.push(node1->left);
                Q2.push(node2->left);
            }
            else if(node2->left){
                node1->left = node2->left;
            }
            if(node1->right && node2->right){
                node1->right->val = node1->right->val + node2->right->val;
                Q1.push(node1->right);
                Q2.push(node2->right);
            }
            else if(node2->right){
                node1->right = node2->right;
            }
        }
        return t1;
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    int rangeSumBST(TreeNode* root, int L, int R) {
        if(!root){
            return 0;
        }
        int s = 0;
        int t = 0;
        vector<int> trace;
        helper(root, trace);
        for (int i=0; i<trace.size(); i++){
            if(trace[i]==L){
                t = 1;
            }
            s += t*trace[i];
            if(trace[i]==R){
                break;
            }
        }
        return s;
    }
    void helper(TreeNode* root, vector<int>& trace){
        if(!root){
            return;
        }
        helper(root->left, trace);
        trace.push_back(root->val);
        helper(root->right, trace);
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    int maxLevel = 0;

    int maxDepth(TreeNode* root) {
        if (!root) {
            return 0;
        }
        dfs(root, 1);
        return maxLevel;
    }

    void dfs(TreeNode* root, int level) {
        if (!root)
            return;
        if (level > maxLevel) maxLevel = level;
        dfs(root->left, level + 1);
        dfs(root->right, level + 1);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<vector<int>> subsets(vector<int>& nums) {
        vector<int> item;
        vector<vector<int>> result;
        result.push_back(item);
        if(nums.size() == 0){
            return result;
        }
        helper(0, item, result, nums);
        return result;
    }
    void helper(int i, vector<int>& item,
    vector<vector<int>>& result,
    vector<int> nums){
        if(i >= nums.size()){
            return;
        }
        item.push_back(nums[i]);
        result.push_back(item);
        helper(i+1, item, result, nums);
        item.pop_back();
        helper(i+1, item, result, nums);
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> postorder(Node* root) {
        vector<int> result;
        if(!root){
            result;
        }
        helper(root, result);
        return result;
    }
    void helper(Node* root, vector<int>& result){
        if(!root){
            return;
        }
        vector<Node*> chi = root->children;
        for(int i=0; i<chi.size(); i++){
            helper(chi[i], result);
        }
        result.push_back(root->val);
    }
};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    TreeNode* searchBST(TreeNode* root, int val) {
        if(!root){
            return NULL;
        }
        TreeNode* result = NULL;
        helper(root, val, result);
        return result;
    }
    void helper(TreeNode* root, int val, TreeNode*& result){
        if(!root){
            return;
        }
        int value = root->val;
        if(val == value){
            result = root;
        }
        else if(val < value){
            helper(root->left, val, result);
        }
        else if(val > value){
            helper(root->right, val, result);
        }
    }
};

/**

};

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(NULL), right(NULL) {}
 * };

class Solution {
public:
    TreeNode* lowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode* root, TreeNode* p, TreeNode* q) {
        if(!root || !p || !q){
            return NULL;
        }
        TreeNode* result = root;
        // æ‰¾åˆ°ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ°pçš„è·¯å¾„
        vector<TreeNode*> vec;
        vector<TreeNode*> tracep;
        DFS(root, p, tracep, vec);
        // æ‰¾åˆ°ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ°qçš„è·¯å¾„
        vec.clear();

        // æ­£ç€éå†ä¸¤ä¸ªvectorï¼Œåˆ°æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªç›¸ç­‰çš„
        int len_p = tracep.size();
        int len_q = traceq.size();
        if(len_p > len_q){
            for(int i=0; i<len_q; i++){
                if(tracep[i]->val == traceq[i]->val){
                    result = tracep[i];
                }
            }
        }
        else{
            for(int i=0; i<len_p; i++){
                if(tracep[i]->val == traceq[i]->val){
                    result = tracep[i];
                }
            }
        }
        return result;
    }
    void DFS(TreeNode* root, TreeNode* node, vector<TreeNode*>& trace
    , vector<TreeNode*>& vec){
        if(!root){
            return;
        }
        vec.push_back(root);
        if(root == node){
            //vec.push_back(node);
            trace = vec;
            return;
        }
        DFS(root->left, node, trace, vec);
        DFS(root->right, node, trace, vec);
        vec.pop_back();
    }
};

#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
 
using namespace std; //åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’
 
int main(){
    int N;
    int result = 0;
    while(cin >> N){
        vector<int> dp(N, 1);
        vector<int> nums(N, 0);
        for (int i=0; i<N; i++){
            cin >> nums[i];
            for (int j=0; j<i; j++){
                if(nums[j] < nums[i]){
                    dp[i] = max(dp[i], dp[j]+1);
                }
            } 
            result = max(result, dp[i]);
        }
        cout<<result<<endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}

#include<iostream>

using namespace std; //åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’
 
int main(){
    int N;
    while(cin >> N){
        vector<int> array(N+1, 0);
        vector<int> nums(N, 0);
        int len = 1;
        cin >> nums[0];
        array[len] = nums[0];
        for (int i=1; i<N; i++){
            cin >> nums[i];
            if(nums[i]>array[len]){
                array[++len] = nums[i];
            }
            else{
                int left = 1;
                int right = len;
                int pos = 0;
                while(left <= right){
                    int mid = (left + right) / 2;
                    if (array[mid] < nums[i]){
                        pos = mid;
                        left = mid + 1;
                    }
                    else{
                        right = mid - 1;
                    }
                }
                array[pos+1] = nums[i];
            }
        }
        cout<<len<<endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}

using namespace std;

int main(){
    string str;
    string result = "";
    while(cin >> str){ 
        //cout << "*****" << str << "*****" << endl;
        int max = 0;
        int a[256] = {0};
        for(int i=0; str[i]!='\0'; i++){
            int num = str[i];
            a[num]++;
            //cout << str[i] << "*";
        }
        for (int j=0; j<256; j++){
            if (max < a[j]){
                max = a[j];
            }
        }
        while(max!=0){
            for (int k=0; k<256; k++){
                if (max == a[k]){
                    char c = k;
                    result.append(1, c);
                    //cout << result << "**";
                }
            }
            max--;
        }
        cout << result << endl;
        result = "";
        str = "";
    }
    
    return 0;
}

#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

bool cmp(int a, int b){
    return a > b;
}

int main(void){
    int N = 0;
    while(cin >> N){
        vector<int> nums(N, 0);
        for (int i=0; i<N; i++){
            cin >> nums[i];
        }
        int flag = 0;
        cin >> flag;
        if (flag == 0){
            sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());
        }
        else{
            sort(nums.begin(), nums.end(), cmp);
        }
        for (int j=0; j<N; j++){
            cout << nums[j] << ' ';
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
